column4: nobody knows something about the right work of the metapackages when it comes to upgrades? I want to deinstall some apps like Evolution, Tomboy etc. but dont want to break with some kind of upgrading stuff if it depends on ubuntu-desktop for example!
How about two international ubuntu support channels, one for beginner questions, another for advanced topics?
they all start from here anyway
CoasterMaster: And the more advanced topics?
